typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AcceptedAnswerId} as long,
		{_AnswerCount} as long,
		{_Body} as string,
		{_ClosedDate} as string,
		{_CommentCount} as long,
		{_CommunityOwnedDate} as string,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_FavoriteCount} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastActivityDate} as string,
		{_LastEditDate} as string,
		{_LastEditorDisplayName} as string,
		{_LastEditorUserId} as long,
		{_OwnerDisplayName} as string,
		{_OwnerUserId} as long,
		{_ParentId} as long,
		{_PostTypeId} as long,
		{_Score} as long,
		{_Tags} as string,
		{_Title} as string,
		{_ViewCount} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SrcPost
UnpivotTags select(mapColumn(
		PostId,
		TagName = TagName1
	)) ~> Select
Select aggregate(groupBy(TagName),
	Count = count(PostId)) ~> AggrTags
SelectPost derive(TagName1 = regexExtract(TagList, '<(.+?)>',1),
		TagName2 = regexExtract(TagList, '<(.+?)>',2),
		TagName3 = regexExtract(TagList, '<(.+?)>',3),
		TagName4 = regexExtract(TagList, '<(.+?)>',4),
		TagName5 = regexExtract(TagList, '<(.+?)>',5)) ~> DrvUnknown
SrcPost select(mapColumn(
		PostId = {_Id},
		LastActivityDate = {_LastActivityDate},
		TagList = {_Tags}
	)) ~> SelectPost
DrvUnknown unpivot(output(
		Tags as string,
		TagName1 as string,
		TagName2 as string,
		TagName3 as string,
		TagName4 as string,
		TagName5 as string
	),
	ungroupBy(PostId),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> UnpivotTags
AggrTags sink(input(
		{_TagName} as string,
		{_Count} as long,
		LastActivityDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true) ~> DestPostsByTags
